body:
This is a sync copy which:
(1) will make TF scheduling slow; and
(2) uses the default stream which breaks TF conventions.

You may use OP_REQUIRES(context, stream->ThenMemcpy(...), ...) for such copies, see [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/segment_reduction_ops.cc#L254) for an example.
